title: League File Not Working?

replies.body:
So the steps in this image weren't helping with this error?

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

If not, we may need to hit this a little harder by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall and clean uninstall.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iPYndurc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T00:22:17.388+0000)
>
> So the steps in this image weren't helping with this error?
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
> 
> If not, we may need to hit this a little harder by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall and clean uninstall.

No, I tried that and it worked for a bit, but then the message came up again.
I'm installing and using the Hextech Repair Tool now, thank you for the recommendation.
